God of WisdomAnswered on 09 Aug 2019With the current SSB first 4 year rates, a Money Market fund would perform similarly well and with a faster withdrawal turnaround of a few days max rather than up to a month for SSBs.
Another option may be CIMB fast saver.0 comments2
